When `i` increments to 33 in the loop, `plt.subplot(8,4,33)` will raise an error because the subplot index is out of bounds for an 8x4 grid.

The loop increments `i` before the first plot, making `i` start at 1, and then continues to increment it. This means that when `i` becomes 33, it will try to plot outside the defined subplot grid, leading to an IndexError.
